website_summaries.verdict: At half the price of most jumpers, this still gives all the features, comfort, and fun.
pros: The spring comes with a safety cover
Some owners have hung it from metal rods or even in an outside tree, and are very happy with the results
cons: Very difficult to get the fabric off for washing
Some have complained of the seat turning over if the baby leans out too far
The spring is not of the best quality

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter for my grandbaby. she enjoys it. You need to have sturdy trim on your door frames to hang it from.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: When my daughter was young she loved her Johnny Jump up
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter was young she loved her Johnny Jump up. She would bounce and giggle and twist and giggle. This one has been made so safe that it no fun. The spring is so stiff that it barely bounces and it squeaks so loudly that it scared my grand daughter the first time she tried it. Joanne
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this! Best gift ever to keep him occupied and having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, stiff spring
customer_reviews.text: The spring is so stiff it is difficult for my baby to move himself. It is so noisy when it moves my baby is too scared to try to jump. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Jump and laugh
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it until he out grew it. He used everyday. My son had one when he was a little boy and he would laugh and jump in it. Father like son
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Some of these are too large for a year old. This one is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Zetlmaier

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it worth price start using it at 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Like product. Theo (6 mo) loves it! Only downside is cumbersome adjustment of seat highth above floor. The seat suspension strap does not hold its position in the adjustment buckle and a knot in the strap must be tied. Easily done but an unnecessary nuisance. SB
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: The jumper spring was noisy and scared baby but customer service was excellent when contacted them about product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they love it. it's better than the one they had ...
customer_reviews.text: they love it. it's better than the one they had when mom was a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Nell

customer_reviews.title: Jumper Joy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this jumper! It got him motivated to crawl and explore! If he's not on the jumper he wants to jump on me. This is also a great tool to tire him out before bedtime!!!
customer_reviews.author: lauren mckee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: every mother should have one of these. the baby loves it and helps mom to do other things.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Price is too high
customer_reviews.text: There are other stores you can buy this product at for $19.99. It's ridiculous that they are trying to charge more than double what other stores are. I would definitely shop around for better pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Tifftero

customer_reviews.title: cheaper at wal mart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for $20 there, same design and all. It's great and serves its purpose. I wouldn't pay Amazons price, however.
customer_reviews.author: William Scott Gabbard

product_meta.title: Evenflo Johnny Jump Up Doorway Door Jumper Exerciser Activity Center, Bumbly
product_meta.description: "Bounce bounce bounce, bounce bounce bounce," might be the lyrics to your favorite party song, but soon it's all your little babe is going to be doing in their Evenflo Johnny Jump Up Doorway Jumper. While you're cooking up your new subscription box recipe or binging the latest hot show, your tiny tot will be bouncing and giggling away in this fun jumper. Plus, you'll always know they're safe and secure thanks to the sturdy door latch and enclosed springs. Give your happy little bug a place to play safely with the Johnny Jump Up jumper.
feature_bullets: Dimensions (L x W x H): 15.5 x 7.1 x 4.1 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
